test.name: Open Thinx Homepage Using Chrome Browser

kw.name: Open Thinx Homepage Using Chrome Browser
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Element Screenshot
kw.doc: Captures a screenshot from the element identified by ``locator`` and embeds it into log file.

kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.msg: Executing JavaScript: window.scrollTo(0,2700) Without any arguments.
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.msg: Element '//section[contains(.,'best sellersstaff pickssleepbuttery softXSSMLXL1X2X3X4XPeriodUltra Soft Sleep Sh')]' is displayed.
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Element Screenshot
kw.doc: Captures a screenshot from the element identified by ``locator`` and embeds it into log file.

kw.name: Validate Next Arrow Carousel on homepage
Element Should Be Visible
kw.msg: Element '//button[@class='next flex size-7.5 items-center justify-center rounded-full border border-default p-2 [&>svg]:h-2.5 [&>svg]:w-3']' is displayed.
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Validate the content block during the transition of Carousel
Wait Until Page Contains Element

kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
